content: वृषन् {%<ab>m.</ab>%} [वृष्-कनिन्] {@--1@} A bull. {@--2@} The sign {%Taurus%} of the zodiac. {@--3@} The chief of a class; प्राचेतसो मुनिवृषा प्रथमः कवीनां <ls>Mv. 1. 7.</ls> {@--4@} A stallion, horse. {@--5@} Pain, sorrow. {@--6@} Insensibility to pain. {@--7@} <ab>N.</ab> of Indra; वृषेव सीतां तदवग्रहक्षतां <ls>Ku. 5. 61</ls>, <ls n="Ku. 5.">80</ls>; <ls>R. 10. 52</ls>, <ls n="R.">17. 77.</ls> {@--8@} <ab>N.</ab> of Karṇa. {@--9@} Of Agni. {@--10@} Of Soma.
